column1: #FORMAT=WebAnno TSV 3.2
#T_SP=webanno.custom.Referent|entity|infstat
#T_RL=webanno.custom.Coref|type|BT_webanno.custom.Referent
#Text=DS : If you could choose your own death , how would you die ?
#Text=AN : [ Laughs ]
#Text=I would want to steal what I heard a mutual friend of ours said .
#Text=He said when he died -- it 's not how he died , but this is what I heard -- he said when he 's dead , he wants his corpse to be dressed up like Superman and thrown out of an airplane .
#Text=I thought that would be fitting .
#Text=But I 'm not ready to think about death , not just yet .
#Text=DS : You guys have been described as Metal and Glam rock .
#Text=What would you describe your sound as ?
#Text=AN : I would call us anthem rock .
#Text=We 're really not heavy metal .
#Text=I think our focus is more on writing great singles , as best as we can make them .
#Text=Pop music .
#Text=That 's just something Bryn and I grew up on .
#Text=We 're big fans of melody and big driving hooks , that sort of thing .
#Text=DS : Would you say anthem rock more in the Mötley Crüe vane or more in the T. Rex vane ?
#Text=AN : I would say half and half .
#Text=Our influences do n't just stop with hair metal and things like that .
#Text=We draw on things like Thin Lizzy , Boston , bands like that .
#Text=Not necessarily virtuosic sort of musicianship , but things that are put together .
#Text=We like to spend the time when we are writing our songs that we are taking all the extraneous crap out of it .
#Text=We just want to make good , hook-drive pop music .
#Text=DS : Does the war in Iraq affect you artistically at all ?
#Text=AN : [ Laughs ]
#Text=No , not at all .
#Text=No , you could say I 'm just like everybody else .
#Text=I read the paper and blogs , and I 'm just as horrified as everybody else .
#Text=I 'm definitely not a fan of this war .
#Text=DS : If you had to fight in Iraq or Afghanistan , where would you fight ?
#Text=AN : Oh , the fight was definitely in Afghanistan .
#Text=Iraq was a much different animal .
#Text=DS : Are you more inspired by things in nature or things that are man made ?
#Text=AN : I would probably have to go with nature .
#Text=I 'm a student of science .
#Text=I have a degree in environmental geology .
#Text=When I was 19/20 years old I went through all the regular existential questions people that age go through : why am I here and my place in the universe , that sort of thing .
#Text=" You can typically read anywhere that humanity is a virus , a plague , on Mother Earth .
